Blog.post: Sup ppl? Well know I am getting used to this, lol. So ya, umm my girl is going to work dammit. she works till sunday hmmm FUN! But i get to see her on Friday and Saturday YAY!!! I LOVE HER SO MUCH Tiffany ~n~ Ryan Together Forever

Hey everyone I am sitting with corey just doing abosolutley nothing....I got a couple of emails from Tiffany WOOHOO! SHE LOVES ME YAY! I wrote two poems for her called, The Prayer, and Before You...She said she liked them but who knows maybe she is just being a girlfriend...But I truly think she is the one for me...One day I said i love you to her...and my hole world changed...i look at life diffrent, she is always on mind or i am talking about her....jus ask around to see what I mean...I am so happy that it bothers me sometimes...and for once i have everything i asked for in a girl...But know I am the most happiest perosn in the entire world becuase I am with Tiffany!!!!!!!!!! :D

Hey, Everyone.....This thing is getting better by the minute....but ya its like 12:30 and i can't sleep, and i havent talked to my tiffany in like what seems like FOREVER!!!!! HELP!!!!! well there aint much to update rite now...besides.........nothing well later everyone

Sup??? this is my first ever online journal....(there weird)...to me a journal was a private thing but what ever.....i got bored so i decided to do this, my first entry i called my new life becuase before hand i was with a girl named Brandi...but she cheated on me 2ce and it messed up everything...i couldnt trust her didnt want her goin anywhere so we finally broke up ( jimmie u must be happy huh??) lol...but now i am with a wonderful girl named Tiffany, even though we have only been together for a short while...i feel like we have been togehter for ever. She means so much to me i wrote a poem.......and if u no me that is a BIG PROBLEM.....me....writting a poem.....but it tells excatly how i feel for her....and it only grows one way ever second.........greater
